snippet: Loretta Brett was convicted of manslaughter on Friday, in the death of Marchella Pierce, a Brooklyn girl who died in 2010 after being battered and starved.
abstract: Loretta Brett is found guilty of manslaughter in the death of her 4-year-old granddaughter Marchella Pierce, who died in 2010 after being battered and starved; Brett faces 15 years in prison; Pierce's mother Carlotta Brett-Pierce was convicted of murder by a separate jury.
lead_paragraph: Loretta Brett was convicted of manslaughter on Friday, in the death of Marchella Pierce, a Brooklyn girl who died in 2010 after being battered and starved.

headline.seo: Grandmother Is Convicted of Manslaughter in Death of Marchella Pierce
